column4: Is there a way to just have the desktop environment of Ubuntu 7.04 launch strate into a text console on boot-up after being installed via the LiveCD? If so, what would I do on the keyboared ton insure X wasn't used?
I'm asking because My main thought was to Use the Speakup kernel modules loaded  into latest Ubuntu.
there is some file that contains what are the default system run states, so if you could change your default run state to a text-based one, you would achieve your ibjective
i'd have to look, and right now i am not a broken system
